quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Ernest Borgnine and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: When did the movie Scream hit the theaters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1996

questions.question: In the movie Scream did Matthew Lillard (Stu) ad-lib some of his lines?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What is the name of the fictional town in which the movie Scream is set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Woodsboro

questions.question: Ernest Borgnine portrayed Lt. Quinton McHale on The Phil Silvers Show from 1962-1966.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: This is one of the first times that the Scarlet Letter was put on film. This silent version released in 1926 brings all the heart-wrenching drama of Hawthornes story, and is perhaps even more poignant without sound. Name the 2 stars who play Hester and Reverend Dimmesdale..

options.text: Douglas Fairbanks Sr and Mary Pickford

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lillian Gish and Lars Hanson

questions.question: Actor Ernest Borgnine is a mason.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Ernest Borgnine debuted on Broadway playing a male nurse in what production?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harvey

questions.question: Ernest Borgnine played General Worden in this 1967 hit military movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dirty Dozen

questions.question: In 1955, Ernest Borgnine starred in Marty, which earned him an Academy Award for Best Actor.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is Sydneys mothers name in the movie Scream?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maureen

questions.question: How long was the opening scene of the movie Scream?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 12 mins

questions.question: From 1984-1986, Ernest Borgnine starred with Jan-Michael Vincent as an aging helicopter pilot in which program?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Airwolf

questions.question: In the movie Scream what kind of a store does Randy work at?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Video

questions.question: Tatum, played by Rose McGowan in the movie Scream, died by being gutted and hung from a tree.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: How many times has Ernest Borgnine been married?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 5

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bambi and Mother
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, midnight. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Diamonds are Forever, Bond encounters a villain named Bambi.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Happiness is fleeting in the story of Bambi as another stag fights him for this mate. What is this deers name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ronno

questions.question: In the original Disney script  Bambi was supposed to be shot by the hunters instead of the mother.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who wrote the original story on which the movie Bambi is based?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Felix Salten

questions.question: Denzel Washington has a son who signed to play with the New Orleans Saints.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What season is it when Bambis mother is shot by the poachers in the movie Bambi?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: winter

questions.question: There is an asteroid named Bambi.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the last thing humans do in the fictional story of Bambi?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Start a forest fire

questions.question: In the Disney animated feature Bambi, after the mother is shot, Bambis father leads him away into the thicker parts of the woods. What is  the name of Bambis father?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Prince of the Woods

questions.question: Denzel Washington is named after his father who was in turn named after the doctor who had delivered him.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When was the film Bambi released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1942

questions.question: Which statement about Bambi is true?

options.text: Tyrus Wong was the head animator for Bambi, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs and Cinderella.
Bambi is played continuously from 9 A.M. to 6 P.M. at the Dover Theater in New York City.
At first Walt Disney did not want to make the film but his brother, Roy, urged him to.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hitler banned Bambi.

questions.question: The backgrounds in Bambi are often in soft focus. Which statement explains why?

options.text: It helped put the focus on the main characters.
Disney wanted a serene feel to all the scenes.
It was a style developed by the Disney studios in the 1920s
The technology at the time would not allow for great resolution.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It helped put the focus on the main characters.

questions.question: In the movie Midnight Run, how much money does Jonathan Mardukas embezzle from Las Vegas gangster Jimmy Serrano?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 15 million

questions.question: One of the people who voiced Bambi became a career Marine, served in two theaters of war, but never killed an animal.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Batman
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, people, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: How does The Joker, Batmans archenemy, entice the people of Gotham to attend the parade?

options.text: He promises to donate money to fight crime.
He promises to turn himself in to the police.
He promises to throw 20 million dollars to the crowd.
He promises Batman will be arrested.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He promises to throw 20 million dollars to the crowd.

questions.question: What is the name of Jack Napier/The Jokers right-hand man throughout the movie Batman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bob

questions.question: What is the name of Gothams main newspaper in the movie Batman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Gotham Globe

questions.question: What was the name of the lowlife the two thieves in the beginning of the 1989 movie Batman were talking about on the rooftop?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Johnny Gobs

questions.question: Throughout this movie, Alonzo Mosely is constantly taking something from the other bounty hunter. What does he take from him all throughout the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: cigarettes

questions.question: In the movie Midnight Run, Jack Walsh is having trouble taking Jonathan Mardukas back to Los Angeles right away. Why is he having trouble taking him back?

options.text: Jack Walsh forgot his wallet and has no money to buy  airline tickets
Mardukas does not have identification to get on the plane
They miss their flight and are unable to get another one

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mardukas is afraid of flying

questions.question: What were the names of the two models killed by The Jokers Smile-X poison in the 1989 movie Batman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Candy Walker and Amanda Keeler

questions.question: In the movie Midnight Run, what actor portrayed Law Vegas gangster Jimmy Serrano?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennis Farina

questions.question: What anniversary was Gotham celebrating in the 1989 film Batman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 200th

questions.question: At the end of this great movie Jack gives Jonathan something to remember their adventure together. What does he give Jonathan at the end of the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: his wrist watch

questions.question: Who was Batmans love interest in the first Batman movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vicki Vale

questions.question: In the movie Midnight Run, there was another bounty hunter aside from Jack Walsh who was also in heavy pursuit of Jonathan Mardukas. What was his name in the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marvin Dorfler

questions.question: In the movie Midnight Run, Jack used to be a detective. What police department did he work in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicago Police Department

questions.question: Who shouldnt live in Gotham according to fictional character Jack Napier?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: decent people

questions.question: What kind of float did The Joker ride on for Gothams parade in the movie Batman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a cake
